mapper.insert: insert into delivery_address(order_num, deli_zipcode, deli_addr, deli_detail_addr, receiver, deli_phone) values (#{orderNum}, #{deliZipcode}, #{deliAddr}, #{deliDetailAddr}, #{receiver}, #{deliPhone})
insert into product_order(order_num, id, order_total_price, order_date, deli_req, exist_addr_flag) values (#{orderNum}, #{id}, #{orderTotalPrice}, sysdate, #{deliReq}, #{existAddrFlag})
insert into order_detail(order_num, prd_num, order_cnt, order_price) values (#{orderNum}, #{prdNum}, #{cartPrdCnt}, #{orderPrice})
